div.bibl: Onze Toekomst, Mar. 21, 1936. CORRESPONDENCE FROM ROSELAND

body.p: The Reverend H. P. Schuurmans, pastor of the Hastings Street Reformed Congregation of Chicago hopes to give a lecture and debate in the church building of the Second Christian Reformed Congregation at 106th Place and Perry Avenue on March 25th. The topic will be: The influence of Christian principles in Social life. Free admission. Time 7:45 P.M. Show your interest by your presence.
